opennlp.ccg.ngrams
Class FactoredNgramModel

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.NgramScorer
      opennlp.ccg.ngrams.FactoredNgramModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reversible, FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
public class FactoredNgramModel
extends NgramScorer

A scorer for a factored n-gram backoff model. The file format is the one generated by the SRILM version 1.4.1 fngram-count tool. Only static backoff orders are supported at present, with the most distant parent variable dropped at each backoff point. Unknown words/factors are mapped to <unk> if the latter is present in the model.

Version:
$Revision: 1.22 $, $Date: 2011/10/11 03:29:42 $
Author:
Michael White

Loads a factored n-gram model for the given child variable, with the given parent variables, from the file with the given name, in the SRILM format. The flag for using sem classes is defaulted to true.

Method Detail

ngram

protected List<String> ngram(int i,
                             int order)
Returns a list of feature keys for the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, using the keys in keysList after setting them appropriately with setKeysToNgram; returns null if this operation does not succeed normally. With factored models, factor keys are sequenced as two string keys.

Overrides:
ngram in class NgramScorer

logProbFromNgram

protected float logProbFromNgram(int i,
                                 int order)
Returns the log prob of the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, with backoff. If using sem classes, then words with replacement sem classes are mapped to words with the sem class replacing the form and stem. Any remaining unknown words/factors are mapped to <unk>, if the latter is present in the model.

Specified by:
logProbFromNgram in class NgramScorer
